subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the four years that the N.B.A.’s current referee-evaluation system has operated, it has been anything but transparent, several N.B.A. referees said this week.
snippet: In the four years that the N.B.A.’s current referee-evaluation system has operated, it has been anything but transparent, several N.B.A. referees said this week.
